name: PARID
title: Parcel Identification Number
description: A 16 character unique identifier for the parcel.

name: PROPERTYHOUSENUM
title: House Number
description: House Number for the  physical location of property; may be zero or blank.

name: PROPERTYFRACTION
title: House Number Fraction
description: Continued House Number information for the  physical location of property; such as 1/2, the house number ending range, or a letter.

name: PROPERTYADDRESS
title: Street
description: Street name for the  physical location of the property, including directional indicators and suffixes.

name: PROPERTYCITY
title: City
description: City where the property is physically located.

name: PROPERTYSTATE
title: State
description: State where the property is physically located.

name: PROPERTYUNIT
title: Unit Number
description: Unit numbers for the property, such as condo units (e.g. 1, 3C,  115A, B13, etc�.).

name: PROPERTYZIP
title: Zip code
description: Zip Code where the property is physically located.

name: MUNICODE
title: Municipality Code
description: Municipality number associated with specified parcel.

name: MUNIDESC
title: Municipality Name
description: Municipality name associated with specified parcel.

name: OWNERCODE
title: Owner Type Code 1
description: Numeric code categorizes owner as individuals ('REGULAR' ) vs corporations ('CORPORATION').

name: OWNERDESC
title: Owner Description
description: Descriptions for numeric owner codes.  [e.g. individuals ('REGULAR' ) vs corporations ('CORPORATION')]

name: CLASS
title: Class
description:
Broad self-explanatory categories for describing the  general use of a parcel.
Categories:  R - RESIDENTIAL, U - UTILITIES, I - INDUSTRIAL,
C - COMMERCIAL, O - OTHER, G - GOVERNMENT, F - AGRICULTURAL.

name: CLASSDESC
title: Class Description
description:
Broad self-explanatory categories for describing the  general use of a parcel.
Categories:  R - RESIDENTIAL, U - UTILITIES, I - INDUSTRIAL,
C - COMMERCIAL, O - OTHER, G - GOVERNMENT, F - AGRICULTURAL.

name: USECODE
title: Land Use Code
description: More detailed than class, these categories further describe the primary use of the parcel.  There are about 200 self-explanatory categories.

name: USEDESC
title: Land Use Code Description
description: More detailed than class, these categories further describe the primary use of the parcel.  There are about 200 self-explanatory categories.

name: LOTAREA
title: Sum of Area of Land
description: Total square footage of land.

name: HOMESTEADFLAG
title: Homestead Flag
description: A property owner may apply for a homestead reduction on their primary residence.  If granted (indicated by 'HOM') the owner will receive a standard reduction on their assessment for County taxes under Act 50.  They may also receive a variable reduction on their School taxes under Act 1.

name: CLEANGREEN
title: Clean and Green Flag
description: This field indicates that a parcel is receiving a reduction in their assessment due to the state�s Clean and Green preferential assessment program.

name: FARMSTEADFLAG
title: Farmstead Flag
description: A property owner may apply for a farmstead reduction if their primary residence is a farm with at least 10 contiguous acres.  If granted (indicated by 'FRM') the owner will receive a standard reduction on their assessment for County taxes under Act 50.

name: ABATEMENTFLAG
title: Abatement Flag
description:
This field indicates that a parcel is receiving a reduction in their County assessment due to a County-approved incentive program.   Specific programs and amounts vary according to the County resolutions and ordinances in effect at the time.  Consult the Office of Property Assessments web page to see the current types of Abatements.

Abatements have been available to residential property owners as incentives for new construction and for building improvements.  Abatements for commercial properties have been available for local economic revitalization programs.

Values:  'Y' or null.

name: SALEDATE
title: Sale Date
description: Date the sale occurred  (mm/dd/yyyy).

name: CHANGENOTICEADDRESS1
title: Change Notice Full Address 1
description: Address of owner of the property.

name: CHANGENOTICEADDRESS2
title: Change Notice Full Address 2
description: Address of owner of the property.

name: CHANGENOTICEADDRESS3
title: Change Notice Full Address 3
description: Address of owner of the property.

name: CHANGENOTICEADDRESS4
title: Change Notice Full Address 4
description: Address of owner of the property.
